attributes.action: scrap free travel for school kids in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in order to tackle obesity and increasing fares the free travel for kids needs to be scrapped. 

a majority of school kids go just two stops down the road to get to school, the primeminster should consider the following points:

1: limiting the free travel to students who only live out of reach of their school and require transport.

2: School kids dont go to school on a weekend, so let them pay their way.

3:the re-introduction of 40p fares for school children would raise enough money to take some off for the daily commuter who goes to work.
